extends java.lang.Object
    a class that represent the central deck of the game
    Author:
    Nikos Gounakis

      • getNewTrainCard

        public void getNewTrainCard(Player p)
                     throws InvalidMoveException
        Transformer:
        Precondition :p must be a valid object and the stack of train cards must not be empty
        Postcondition :adds 2 or 1 train cards on the player hands
        Parameters:
        p - the player who chose to get new cards
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the stack of cards is empty or there are no 5 cards on the deck

        Postcondition :adds 1 destination cards on the player hands
        Parameters:

        number - the number of cards the player want to draw
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the stack is empty
